question: A friend of yours is going on holiday soon and has asked you to recommend a destination.Write a letter to your friend and recommend a good place for a holiday that you have visited before.Say -where you went,-Where you stayed,-What you can do there and what the food was like.
text: It's glad to hear about you getting free time for your family after years of hard work. I would surely suggest you plan your next holiday to an isolated island free from people and full of privacy and spend a good quality of time with your life partner.

Firstly, I recently visited the Maldives last Diwali with my better half which is known as the Island capital of the world and has the most scenic,beautiful views and water in the lap of nature.Furthermore, I stayed in a 5-star property named Taj Exotica Resorts and Villas, in Soneva Fushi Island, part of south Maldives.It has all luxurious Overwater villas and Beachside bungalows with Jacuzzi and private pools.

Secondly,you can enjoy plenty of time swimming in the crystal clear ocean, they also have a Deck where couples can enjoy the  dance.Lastly, the Multi-cuisine restaurant had varieties of dishes from around the world. Each dish had a different type of expression and the taste of it was mouth-watering.Don't forget to order Thai food, the best that I loved.
Hope, this letter thrills and motivate you for going on a vacation.
